transcript: so I think that you absolutely still want to ship a product that's exceptional you just narrowly Define the problem and then over time you will expand the scope of the problem if you ship a product and it doesn't solve the problem that you're going out for you will fail it's better to really narrowly Define it and then solve it really well and let the narrow definition of the scope allow you to say I have 100% solved this very narrow problem and then expand it rather than say I'm going to solve this big problem on my first Go Round And that's really unlikely
